ABOUT.TITLE: With (app), activate your best at work and life everyday, in every situation
ABOUT.BODY:
Want to achieve your peak performance at work? Want to prevent burnout and improve your mental wellbeing? Stop anti early aging when you are young, or better manage your weight?

Through diving deep into your daily lifestyle behaviours and circadian rhythm patterns, gain key insights to your health and understand how to optimise your lifestyle effortlessly - to achieve all your goals.

With 42, develop a personalised action plan activate your best at work and life, whenever and wherever.

USECASES.LABEL: USE CASES
USECASES.TITLE: Your all-in-one personalised (digital) coach empowering you to activate your optimal readiness for all important moments in your life.
USECASES.BODY:
Your goals change by context, and (app) is the only app that contextually aligns to all your goals in life and work.
With (app), achieve a holistic wellbeing approach to empower your fullest potential in any situation
USECASES.CASE_1_DESC: Elevate your readiness and functional level, to perform your best & stay optimised at work
USECASES.CASE_2_DESC: Recover from fatigue, prevent burnout and feel rejuvenated in life - in your health, body and mind.
USECASES.CASE_3_DESC: Improve travel readiness, and reduce impacts due to jetlag or irregular work/travel schedules Make the most out of your schedule, and feel energised wherever you are.
USECASES.CASE_4_DESC: Identify and adopt pre-emptive health behaviours. understand yourself better and Improve your quality of life. Understand your body better, and empower yourself to feel the best you can everyday.
USECASES.CASE_5_DESC: Unlock your learning potential, improve your brain function and optimise your mind. Think faster, improve memory, comprehend information better, and operate at a higher brain capacity.

SOLUTION.DESC:
Sleep, fitness, diet - It’s all connected. Current health and wellbeing solutions only specialise in a core aspect, but the truth is, achieving mindful wellbeing requires a holistic approach.

With (app), we target all aspects of your lifestyle, mind and body, developing a holistic wellbeing approach to empower your fullest potential in any situation.

HERO.TITLE: 42 by Detalytics
HERO.DESC: Scientifically proven and uniquely personalised, to enhance your work and life performance

POINT_1.NAME: Context-driven
POINT_1.DESC: Your important events in your life or work are always changing. We adapt and align actionable recommendations personalised to your goals and unique real-time context - to achieve optimal wellbeing for better health and work performance.

POINT_2.NAME: Science, Not Myths
POINT_2.DESC: What you do consistently everyday in your daily lifestyle has a direct impact on your overall wellbeing and work performance.   We dive deep into your daily lifestyle behaviours and circadian rhythm patterns to uncover research-based insights to help optimise your energy and readiness.

POINT_3.NAME: Holistic
POINT_3.DESC: The human body is a system. We analyse your historical, mental and physical health data and lifestyle behaviours, to create a holistic and connected mind and body approach to help you activate a consistent state of readiness.

POINT_1.LABEL: SCIENTIFIC, RESEARCH-BASED APPROACH
POINT_1.TITLE: Designed by leading international experts with over 20+ years of experience in the field of circadian science and performance readiness management
POINT_1.DESC: Targeting just one aspect (sleep, fitness or diet) isn’t enough. With (app), we offer context-specific and personalised insights diving deep into your daily lifestyle behaviours and circadian rhythm patterns. Through a gold-standard science-backed approach supported by a panel of renounced specialists, in the field of medicine, high-performance , our app provides gold-standard insights for you to gain full clarity on your lifestyle patterns and personalised approach in life and work performance management.

POINT_2.LABEL: CONTEXT-DRIVEN TO YOUR LIFESTYLE
POINT_2.TITLE: We demystify health and wellbeing into actionable and context-driven insights that are unique to your lifestyle
POINT_2.DESC: With 42, gain full clarity on your lifestyle patterns  and be guided on what to do at each step of your life journey. Our app provides gold-standard insights for you to gain full clarity on your lifestyle patterns and personalised approach in life and work performance management. We analyze metrics already proven by science and connect the dots between those metrics, your lifestyle behaviours, and its impact on your physical and mental performance.

LIFESTYLE.LABEL: YOUR JOURNEY WITH DETALYTICS
LIFESTYLE.TITLE: Evidence-based life and work transformation in every aspect of your lifestyle
LIFESTYLE.DESC: Gain key personalised  insights into your body, mind and health with baseline assessments. From sleep, activities to diet, optimise your lifestyle behaviours and impact your goals.

STEP_1.NAME: 01 Select Your Personal Goal
STEP_1.LABEL: CONTEXT-DRIVEN
STEP_1.TITLE: Only what’s relevant to you. Select your goal and get a curated experience.
STEP_1.DESC:
From health, learning management to fatigue management and early anti-ageing, pick the goal that best aligns with your current context. Choose from work, quality of life, to travel and financial wellbeing goals. Based on your lifestyle behaviours, receive a personalised action plan aligned to your goals and real-time context.

Set curated goals in body and brain health, such as:

  • Long term Peak Performance
  • Physical & Mental Resilience
  • Optimized Travel Wellbeing
  • Advanced Financial Management

STEP_2.NAME: 02 Assessments and Analytics
STEP_2.TITLE_1: Understand everything that makes you tick. Gain actionable insights personalised to your goals and lifestyle.
STEP_2.DESC_1:
Through medical-backed assessments designed to capture the interconnected factors of your body and mind, understand your lifestyle patterns and it’s holistic impact on your body and mind.

  • Explore baseline assessments from physiological, cognitive to lifestyle
  • Understand factors that influence your daily readiness such as your metabolic and cognitive health, diet risk, lifestyle performance
  • Receive a personal score and how you fare against historical and demographical profiling
STEP_2.TITLE_2: A different you everyday. Dynamically updates, predicts and recommends according to your changing body and mind.
STEP_2.DESC_2:
Based on your lifestyle behaviours, receive a personalised action plan aligned to your selected goals and lifestyle context. Gain full clarity on your lifestyle patterns, and it’s connected impact on your physical and mental performance.

  • Receive daily lifestyle optimization recommendations on how you can improve your lifestyle behaviours
  • Learn how to manage fatigue, jetlag and improve your personal score

STEP_3.NAME: 03 Self Care
STEP_3.TITLE_1: Personalised insights uniquely calibrated to you.
STEP_3.DESC_1:
Backed by circadian science, our AI-driven algorithms mesaure indexes and scores to help you understand your unique body and mind. Through personalised insights, optimise your circadian health and readiness.

  • Personality profile that is unique to you
  • Based on your baseline assessments, receive personalised insights on circadian disruption, cognitive health and lifestyle performance etc
STEP_3.TITLE_2: Work towards a better you. Achievable tasks to help you change your life, bit by bit.
STEP_3.DESC_2:
Change can be daunting, we get it. With (app), getting started is easy. We guide you step-by-step, through actionable recommendations to help you accumulate sustainable atomic habits that improve your quality of life.

  • Lifestyle behaviours optimisation based on sleep, activities and diet
  • Understand how changing your lifestyle behaviours enhances your selected goals - in burnout prevention, learning improvement etc
